talk03:
May the Light of Blessing grant you
the strength you seek.
talk06: You have done well to reach this place...
talk01:
Visitor to this Shrine of Light, that which
imprisons and purifies the ancient evil...
talk08: You have done well to reach this place...
talk10: This is the final Light of Blessing.
talk02:
We offer this light that will cleanse
you of evil.
talk11:
Make your way to the Temple of Time.
There, you shall find a suitable reward
for your efforts.
